nl.esciencecenter.xenon.adaptors.local

Class LocalAdaptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.xenon.engine.Adaptor
      • nl.esciencecenter.xenon.adaptors.local.LocalAdaptor

  • public class LocalAdaptor
extends Adaptor
    LocalAdaptor implements an Xenon adaptor for local operations.
    Since:
    1.0
